title: Bug 120503Cascading Parameter can not drop into layout
OB: Bug 120503Cascading Parameter can not drop into layout Details:Cascading Parameter can not drop into layoutStep:1.Open a report design and Create a Sample Data Source and data set by "select from CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS"2.New a cascading parameter and create CUSTOMERSNUMBER and CUSTOMERSNAME in parameter named number and name. Press OK3.Drop parameter name into layout.Actual results:The parameter in Cascading Parameter Group can not drop to layout
SR: Press OK3.Drop parameter name into layout.Actual results:The parameter in Cascading Parameter Group can not drop to layout
